actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 11 (2d6+4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the war horse skeleton remains motionless and prone, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate war horse skeleton.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: The skeleton doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Undead Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The skeleton is immune to poison damage, to exhaustion, and to the poisoned condition.
